body_html:
Hi @karthee320,

I worked on the iMX.6S for a long time, trying to understand if it is possible to run CNNs on its GPU (Vivante GC2000). Unfortunately the problem regards either the hardware and the OpenCL driver version (1.1 Embedded Profile).

These problems should be solved with the iMX6Q which also support the OpenCL 1.2 Full Profile.

body:
Hi @karthee320,

I worked on the iMX.6S for a long time, trying to understand if it is possible to run CNNs on its GPU (Vivante GC2000). Unfortunately the problem regards either the hardware and the OpenCL driver version (1.1 Embedded Profile).

These problems should be solved with the iMX6Q which also support the OpenCL 1.2 Full Profile.
